TopicTitle: Horns and Sound Mod?(Horns, radio, etc)

Articles.Content: I saw a discussion about this on the steam community , its here>https://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/558751179558138009/?l=norwegian,(it was on the Norwegian version for some reason) and its about train horns. I don't think it ever got resolved, it's from 2014 and searching ''horns ksp'' only comes up with this. I would make it myself, but I don't know that much about modelling the horns, Unity sound, etc. As an idea, the RCS thruster model could be modified and made to emit sound, it already looks like a horn? Thanks.
